intro: Turn a humble roadside Motel into a bustling destination!
description:
Welcome guests from all walks of life and make your motel the talk of the town. From cozy rooms to irresistible amenities, create a memorable stay that keeps travelers coming back for more. Make it stylish, make it special - watch your reputation grow!

Step into the shoes of a Motel manager and master every aspect of hospitality. Balance front desk service, housekeeping, and guest satisfaction while upgrading your property. You'll need to think fast and plan smart to stay ahead of the competition.

Motel Business Simulator is a management game where you run and grow a roadside motel. Maintain rooms, cater to guests' needs, and manage your supplies to keep operations running smoothly and costs low.

Check out this fun new game from the NOSTRA.GAMES team. 

Make your Motel the best place for all the travelers to stay!
